Class TicTacToeController

  • java.lang.Object
    • TicTacToeController
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TicTacToeMain

    public class TicTacToeController
extends java.lang.Object
    this class will implement all the AI's logic for TicTacToe game, including determining best move, place that must be defended, and heuristics for selecting position.

      TicTacToeController()

      • TicTacToeController

        public TicTacToeController()

    • Method Detail

      • getAIPosition

        public int[] getAIPosition(int[][] board)
        In this getAIPosition() method, the current best move will be determined. The highest priority is to pick the position where win is immediately possible. If not, it will pick the position that AI must defend now to prevent a loss. If note, the board will pick based on the defend/attack heuristic.
        Parameters:
        board - game board
        Returns:
        the position that AI will move

      • checkHorizontal

        public boolean checkHorizontal(int row,
                               int column,
                               int[][] board)
        This checkHorizontal() method will check if the horizontal row has a win condition where all positions in the same row have the same value.
        Parameters:
        row - row position
        column - column position
        board - game board
        Returns:
        a boolean value determining whether there's a valid win condition on this row

      • checkVertical

        public boolean checkVertical(int row,
                             int column,
                             int[][] board)
        This checkVertical() method will check if the vertical column has a win condition where all positions in the same column have the same value.
        Parameters:
        row - row position
        column - column position
        board - game board
        Returns:
        a boolean value determining whether there's a valid win condition on this column

      • checkDiagonal

        public boolean checkDiagonal(int row,
                             int column,
                             int[][] board)
        This checkDiagonal() method will check whether the input position will make the diagonal a valid win condition. If the input position is not in the diagonal position, return false immediately since it will not affect the diagonal. Then it will check whether the top-left, center, bottom-right positions have the same values. Then top-right, center, bottom-left positions. If any of those are true, it will return true. Else, it indicates there is no Diagonals that satisfy the win condition
        Parameters:
        row - row position
        column - column position
        board - game board
        Returns:
        a boolean value whether the input position can create a win condition in the diagonals

      • isDiagonal

        public boolean isDiagonal(int row,
                          int col)
        This will check if the input positions is part of the diagonal
        Parameters:
        row - row position
        col - column position
        Returns:
        a boolean value that shows whether the input position is part of the diagonal positions

      • checkStateAfterMove

        public boolean checkStateAfterMove(int row,
                                   int col,
                                   int[][] board)
        This checkStateAfterMove will be called every time when a user or AI moves to check whether either of those has win the game
        Parameters:
        row - input row
        col - input column
        board - game board for checking these booleans
        Returns:
        true if someone won, else, return false

      • existWinMove

        public int[] existWinMove(int[][] board)
        This existWinMove() checks for AI whether there is a move that it can make to guarantee the victory in 1 step. This method will check all the empty positions and check its state if the position is filled, if the state shows victory, the position will be returned.
        Parameters:
        board - game board
        Returns:
        a position where a direct victory is possible, if not, it will return {-1,-1} indicating that there is no 1 step victory position

      • existMustDefend

        public int[] existMustDefend(int[][] board,
                             int player)
        this existMustDefend() method will generate a position that an input player must defend to prevent a loss at that move.
        Parameters:
        board - game board
        player - whose step is it now?
        Returns:
        a position where the player must defend now, if there's none, return {-1,-1} indicating that there is no one step loss.

      • horizontalHeuristic

        public int horizontalHeuristic(int row,
                               int[][] board)
        This will calculate the offensive heuristic for a row by calculating whether the AI can possibly fill up this row to win. If there is already an opponent's piece on this row, return 0 immediately.
        Parameters:
        row - input row that we want to check for our heuristic
        board - game board
        Returns:
        the integer score of heuristic of row

      • verticalHeuristic

        public int verticalHeuristic(int col,
                             int[][] board)
        This will calculate the offensive heuristic for a column by calculating whether the AI can possibly fill up this entire column to achieve a victory. If there already existed an opponent's piece on this column, the method will return 0 immediately.
        Parameters:
        col - input column that we want to check for our heuristic
        board - game board
        Returns:
        the integer score of heuristic of column

      • diagonalHeuristic

        public int diagonalHeuristic(int row,
                             int col,
                             int[][] board)
        This diagonalHeuristic() method will calculate the heuristic value for the diagonals of the input position. If the position doesn't belong to the diagonals, it will return 0 immediately. Then, it will check for the left diagonals and the right diagonals. Based on the input position, either left, right, or their sum will be returned.
        Parameters:
        row - row position
        col - column position
        board - game board
        Returns:
        a heuristic value for diagonals at the input position

      • countWinMove

        public int countWinMove(int[][] board,
                        int player)
        This method() will calculate the number of win move that a player will have at that moment
        Parameters:
        board - game board
        player - player making the move at that moment
        Returns:
        the number of possible win moves at that moment

      • userWillDefend

        public int userWillDefend(int[][] board)
        This userWillDefend() method will calculate the risk of every position an AI enters. It will check for which position that the user must defend, if there's none, return a high value (10). If there is, calculate the number of possible winMoves that user can create if he moves in that position. By doing this, we can prevent any edge case that will generate more than 1 possible win for the user to prevent any potential losses.
        Parameters:
        board - game board
        Returns:
        the risk that AI will be facing. The lower the better

      • calculateAttackHeuristic

        public int calculateAttackHeuristic(int row,
                                    int col,
                                    int[][] board)
        This calculateAttackHeuristic() will sum up the offensive heuristic value for horizontal, vertical, and diagonal for the input position
        Parameters:
        row - input row
        col - input column
        board - game board
        Returns:
        the sum of heuristics value generate for a position

      • selectBasedOnHeuristics

        public int[] selectBasedOnHeuristics(int[][] board)
        This selectBasedOnHeuristics method will generate a move that has the lowest risk based on a priority queue that prioritize low risk value. If 2 have the same risk, it will search for the position that can provide higher offensive heuristic.
        Parameters:
        board - game board
        Returns:
        a position that the AI will move based on the heuristics
